title: Pipriac
text:
Pipriac (; , <a href="Gallo%20language">Gallo</a>: "Pisperiac") is a <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Ille-et-Vilaine">Ille-et-Vilaine</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in <a href="Brittany%20%28administrative%20region%29">Brittany</a> in northwestern <a href="France">France</a>.
It lies southwest of <a href="Rennes">Rennes</a>.
Population.
Inhabitants of Pipriac are called "Pipriatains" in French.
International relations.
Pipriac is <a href="town%20twinning">twinned</a> with the village of <a href="Whitland">Whitland</a> in <a href="Carmarthenshire">Carmarthenshire</a>, <a href="Wales">Wales</a>.
